description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Turkey Enchiladas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Enchiladas,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Christmas leftovers,Sesame free,Enchilada,Quick & easy dinner,Mince,Turkey,Leftovers,Peanut free
name: Cheesy Turkey Enchiladas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 8 minutes or until golden. Add mince and stir until combined. Cook, stirring occasionally with a wooden spoon, for 10 minutes or until browned.

Add quinoa, tomato, salsa and 1/2 cup water. Stir to combine. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 10 minutes or until mince and quinoa are cooked through. Add spring onion, reserving 2 tbs to garnish, and cook for 1 minute. Set aside to cool.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a large shallow baking dish. Place a tortilla on a board. Spoon 1/2 cup mince mixture along one edge. Roll up to enclose filling. Transfer to baking dish. Repeat with remaining tortillas. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve with sour cream, sprinkled with reserved spring onion.
